data.eml:eml: New species of Endecous (Grylloidea, Phalangopsidae, Luzarinae) from the Iguaçu National Park (Brazil), including bioacoustics, cytogenetic and distribution data

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Souza-Dias, Pedro G. B., Szinwelski, Neucir, Fianco, Marcos, Oliveira, Elliott Centeno De, De Mello, Francisco De A. G., Zefa, Edison (2017): New species of Endecous (Grylloidea, Phalangopsidae, Luzarinae) from the Iguaçu National Park (Brazil), including bioacoustics, cytogenetic and distribution data. Zootaxa 4237 (3): 454-470, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4237.3.2
